content: व्यवायः {@--1@} Separation, decomposition, resolution (into components). {@--2@} Dissolution. {@--3@} Covering, concealment. {@--4@} Intervention, interval; अट्कुप्वाङ्नुम्व्यवायेऽपि. {@--5@} An impediment, obstacle. {@--6@} Copulation, sexual intercourse. {@--7@} Purity. --यं Light, lustre.
